page.title: 14GARVESTONE VILLAGE HALL
page.content: { The hall (which dates from the {1st World War)is used for bingo and {other social events.It has a bowling {green. Mrs.Page is the caretaker. { We interviewed Mrs. Sue Thomas {who,at 33, is the Brown Owl of the 1st {Garvestone Brownie Pack.They meet in {the village hall each Monday evening. Q:How many Brownies are there? A:There are 14 Brownies. Q:Who is Tawny Owl? A:Mrs.M.Roper. Q:How many sixes are there? A:There are four sixes. Q:Do you like being the Brown Owl? A:Yes. Q:Are there any difficulties? A:Yes sometimes I cannot think of anything to do. Q:What do they normally do? A:Household skills,Craft,Sports and Games
